get.description: Find users by custom field value. It will return maximum 100 users. The results are sorted by the last custom field value update for a user.

parameters.description: Custom field ID. Use 'phone' or 'email' as custom field id if you want to find the user by phone or email

tag_name.description: Name of the tag to add

Allows to run multiple actions and send multiple messages. Works for all channels.

message_tag.description: Only used by Messenger channel. Use Message channel to send messages outside 24h window

get.description: Get the user cart ready for checkout

amount_received.description: Total value the user paid in cents.

400.description: The amount received is less than the total value of the order.

402.description: The user received a message on Messenger why the checkout failed.

status.description: The new order status. 6 - Processing, 7 - Shipped, 10 - Completed, 13 - Canceled.

402.description: The order status is the same as the previous status

post.description: Add a product to user cart

delete.description: remove a product from user cart

active.description: if users can buy the product.

Cart.description: All value related to money is in cents

created_timestamp.description: Date of the order in epoch/Unix timestamp

Order.description: All value related to money is in cents

price.description: the price is not in cents

type.description: 0 - Text, 1 - Number, 2- Date (Unix timestamp), 3 - Date & Time (Unix timestamp), 4 - Boolean(0 or 1)

value.description: type == 0 then value is string, else value is a number

channel.description: 0 - Messenger, 2 - SMS, 5 - WhatsApp, 7 - Google Business Message, 8 - Telegram, 9 - Webchat

plan.description: 1 - Pro Subscription, 4 - FREE, 6 - Pro No Subscription, 11 - LTD, 12 - LTD, 13 - PRO Trial - Downgrade to FREE at the end, 15 - PRO Trial - Force to pay at the end

created.description: The date (UTC) when the account was created
